site.name: Virtual Bench for Industrial Equipment Diagnostics

name: btn_Save_u0
label: Save
tooltip: Save current config by the sensor name provided.

name: txt_SensorName_u0
label: Sensor Name
tooltip: Sensor Name, and subsquently config file name. No spaces allowed.

name: Get and Join Current Values
Delete selected choice
Get choice to load config file
Get file names and update Drop Down
swt_OnOff_u0
label: Off / On
tooltip: Turn on or off this sensor slot.

name: CHANGE FILE NAME PATH
info: Aqui mudar o comando de modo a funcionar no IOT.

name: README - Notes for the directory structure in IOT2040
info:
# Criar directrio onde sero guardados os config files e posteriormente acedidos.

## Estrutura do Directrio:

---

### project_Data/
###  sensor_Configs/
###    acquired_Data/
###      sensor1_Data.json
###    adicional_NotificationSettings/
###      extra_Noti_1.json
###    current_Configs/
###      config1_Current.json
###    rs232_Configs/
###      config1_rs232.json
###    voltage_Configs/
###      config1_Voltage.json
### 

---

name: Read Me
info:
### A ideia aqui  permitir dar enable ou disable  configurao.
### Podendo desligar ou ligar a entrada em causa.

name: CHANGE FOLDER PATH
info:
### Aqui colocar o path para a pasta correcta de configurao dos sensores em causa. (currente, tenso, rs232)

Neste caso, o path da pasta /../voltage_configs/
